ovdesc.p: Seat Scripts can be copied from various areas by the respective unit testers in to a Stage area where they are maintained. For doing such upload or while downloading scripts from a Master area to our unit area for testing, the SCRIPT.INTERFACE utility can be used.
The Scripts to be uploaded can be Selected using selection criteria and the SELECTED.IDS can be uploaded.

desc.p: Defines the operand to be used with the associated selection field, the operands used are EQ,LK and UL
Value of the selection field to be checked while doing selection criteria.

The field from the Seat Scripts template to be used for making the selection criteria while copying the scripts during upload/download. The fields that are used from seat scripts are ALL, BASE.RELEASE, PRODUCT.GROUP, PRODUCT.CODE, REGRESSION.CYCLE, SCRIPT.GROUP, APPLICATION, FUNCTION, SCRIPT.ID, FLD.NAME, SEAT.ID, COMPANY.CODE.
Refer to the selected Script IDâ€™s that were selected while doing a Selection of Scripts during the Action SELECT.SCRIPTS which would be further used during Upload of scripts.
This refers to the Action that has to be performed for the selected scripts. The various actions that could be performed are SELECT.SCRIPTS, UPLOAD, DOWNLOAD, EXTRACT.REPORT
This is a No Input field that will get updated by the System with a description of the FTP login status when an incorrect login name or password is given in the Script Interface Parameter file.
Defines the identification of a record created under this file. Any Alphanumeric characters are allowed.
This is a No input field updated by the system with the Description of the status of the UPLOAD/DOWNLOAD being performed
